definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: The guardian must be entrusted by the student's parents. The Letter of Entrustment must be legally notarized.
sentences.chinese: 監護人受學生家長委託，委託書須經法律公正方爲。

sentences.english: The production of the "Power of Attorney for Concurrent-Business Insurance Agency" shall be centrally supervised by the CIRC.
sentences.chinese: 《保險兼業代理委託書》由中國保監會統一監製。

sentences.english: The Power of Attorney shall contain the entrusted matters and specified powers.
sentences.chinese: 授權委託書須記明委託事項和權限。

sentences.english: Given one party could not present on the scene due to some reasons, the written Letter of Entrustment shall be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 收養人一方因故不能到場的，應出具書面委託書。

sentences.english: Proxy solicitations have a so called double-edged sword effect.
sentences.chinese: 委託書徵集對公司治理具有“雙刃劍”效應。

sentences.english: I believe that the Grantor understand the consequence of granting the Power of Attorney.
sentences.chinese: 我相信委託人理解簽署授權委託書的後果。

sentences.english: When going through the formalities of applying for inspection, the agent shall submit his letter of authorization to the commodity inspection authorities.
sentences.chinese: 辦理報檢手續時應當向商檢機構提交授權委託書。

definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
